name: hubspot-databox-benchmark
description: Benchmarking environment for HubSpot to Databox integration approaches

scripts.start:infrastructure: docker-compose up -d hubspot-api webhook-server databox-api redis prometheus grafana
scripts.generate:data: docker-compose run --rm benchmark-runner npm run generate-data
scripts.test:all: docker-compose --profile testing up direct-polling webhook-sync hybrid-cdc
scripts.benchmark:run: docker-compose --profile testing run --rm benchmark-runner npm run benchmark
scripts.benchmark:report: docker-compose --profile testing run --rm benchmark-runner npm run generate-report
